resources.string:
How to use Gatherly's mobile app


1. How do I add invite people?

 a. Click on the + icon and a small display will pop up. It will ask you to enter a friend’s email address. Type in a valid email address like abc@gmail.com and press, “ok”.

 b. An invitation has been sent to your friend.

 2. How do I chat with a friend?

 a. Click on the name of the friend you want to chat with and it will open a chat window. You can send messages, share any file (.doc, .docx, .pdf), you can also share an image (.jpg, .png, .jpeg).

 3. How do I know who is currently online?

 a. Click on the + icon and a small display will pop up. It will ask you to enter a friend’s email address. Type in a valid email address like abc@gmail.com and press, “ok”.

 b. An invitation has been sent to your friend.

 4. How do I create groups?

 a. Go to the second tab, on the people icon with a +icon.

 b. Give your group a name in, “Enter group name”.

 c. Select from your list of friends who you want to be part of the group, you need a minimum of 2 members to create a group. Click on the icon at the upper right corner which says, “Create Group”.

 d. This tab will display all of the groups you have created and are a part of.


5. Third tab is the Profile page.

 a. You can change the Display picture by clicking the icon. It will let you select from all of the images in your phone’s gallery and downloaded images.

 b. Clicking on the username will let you edit the username.

 c. Email: Display’s the email id that was used to register on Gatherly’s mobile application.

 d. Change password gives you the option to reset your password.

 e. Sign out will log you out of the application, you will have to log back in to access all of the features of the application.


6. Fourth tab is the global chat room.

 a. Everybody who is on Gatherly is automatically added to this global chat room.

 b. You can send messages, share a file, and share an image.


7. The sixth tab is the Navigation bar, its current functionality is similar to the profile picture.

 a. View profile, will take you to your profile page.

 b. Groups will take you to the groups page.

 c. Invite a friend, lets you send out invitations to your friends.

 d. Helppage
